name: Boxer (tastablehat)
description:
This videogame is called "Boxers" it was made during a game jam "Indie Swarm" and finishe during the weekend from september 18th-20th.2015. The game has three diferent stages all of them related with boxing.

In the first one, the boxer is jumping the rub at the exactly time when the indicator from the table on the left side is passing through the boxing bell.

On the second stage, the boxer needs to punch or jump according to the approuching object.

On the third the boxing is training to be faster.
